description: This symptom involves a significant vulnerability allowing local privilege escalation on various Linux distributions due to a buffer overflow in the glibc dynamic loader's processing of tunables. Specifically, this issue, identified as CVE-2023-4911, affects default installations of Fedora 37 and 38, as well as Ubuntu 22.04 and 23.04, Debian 12 and 13. The exploit can lead to full root privileges, creating a critical risk for affected systems if a reliable exploit is published by third-party researchers.
